QuestData.Title: Salhet's Secret
QuestData.Description: Listen, $n. Before you give up on me, there's something I'd like to show you.$B$BYou see, I'm not much of a fighter. I'm not very coordinated.$B$BI'm more of a tactical mind.$B$BMeet me at the southern end of the ridge and I'll show you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Salhet at the Southern End of the Sunwatcher's Ridge in Uldum.
